channel.title: Settings file
channel.description:
I have a post in general Help and support but I felt I should have posted in this thread instead. My original thread:
[url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=492647#post492647[/url]
I installed the game last night, to the correct default directory, loaded the game and went to change my resolution to the highest I could. Foolishly I think I set it to high and my game crashed. It continues to crash when I try to start the game. I can see the window appear briefly then disappear again.
I have tried to reinstall the application and restart my system to no avail. I have a feeling there is a settings file installed somewhere that might let me change the resolution manually but i cant find it. I have also tried -window as a launch option.
Thank you.

item.title: Settings file
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
You could also remove -window and replace it with -autoconfig, which should set everything to there default system values.

Read full topic

item.title: Settings file
item.dc:creator: vktech
item.description:
Try the launch options “+mat_forcehardwaresync 0 -dxlevel 90” (without quotes).

Also what are your system specs? (CPU, GPU, OS)
